Portfolio

I love discovering how something works and then figuring out how to make it better. See below for projects that I've worked on over the past year.

Federal Trade Commission (FTC)

Sitebuilding: PHP/Drupal API, Features

Theming: Compass, CSS, Grunt, Gulp, Sass

CMS: Drupal 7

Link for the Federal Trade Commision website

Lead maintenance developer responsible for ftc.gov and four multisites (bulkorder.ftc.gov, consumer.gov, consumer.ftc.gov, and military.consumer.gov). Working on standardizing existing codebases to optimize current performance and streamline processes for eventual Druapl 8 migration.

Educators for Excellence (E4E)

Sitebuilding: Context, Display Suite, Features

Theming: Grunt, jQuery, Sass

CMS: Drupal 7

Link for the Educators For Excellence website

Lead developer on a two and a half month redesign project. Worked closely with the backend developer to implement modular design components used throughout the site. Lead other developers in code reviews and task delegation as needed.

Your Yale

Sitebuilding: PHP/Drupal API, Features

Theming: Grunt, jQuery, Living style guides, Sass

CMS: Drupal 7

Link for the Your Yale website

Lead front-end developer for a large-scale migration project (combining 42 sites into one entirely new site) with emphasis on an accessible (WCAG 2.0) and dynamic user experience. Worked closely with the backend developer, designer, UX lead, and project manager to navigate, refine, and implement client needs and requirements.

Accelerate Brain Cancer Cure (ABC2)

Sitebuilding: Beans, Context, Display Suite

Theming: Grunt, Sass

CMS: Drupal 7

Link for the Accelerate Brain Cancer Cure website

Lead front-end developer. Worked closely with designer to implement responsive and accessible design. Assisted in custom module development for display of homepage image grid.
